name: Jukebox
description: Just a simple Discord music bot.

YT_API_KEY.description: Youtube API Key for querying the Youtube API for video data.

CONFIG_OWNERS.description: A Discord ID(s), use comma if you want to add more than 1 owner (DO NOT FILL SOMEONE ELSE ID THAT YOU DON'T TRUST)

CONFIG_TOTALSHARDS.description: Total shards to spawn, use "auto" or a number

CONFIG_ALLOW_DUPLICATE.description: Whether to to all allow users to add duplicate of songs (YES OR NO)
